DOC.brief_summary: Objectives include description current practice ; assessment time K/DOQI goal , clinical outcome , health resource utilization ( HRU ) patient report outcome ( PRO ) impact Sensipar® parameter
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Center , Observational Registry Subjects With Secondary Hyperparathyroidism ( HPT ) Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD )
DOC.criteria: 3 month history Stage 4 Stage 5 CKD A PTH value within 3 month enrollment If relevant , completion Sensipar® study prior enrol Registry Exclusion Criteria : Females pregnant breast feeding
